body: You still have only a single view connected to _RhinoViewName. You need to connect a list of several views if you want to get the results for several view points. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0EqXjSuwdKWHBOs9KDPnCalSXkZdv7Yf2wVZSlabMjplWaquLpfTbkJBjljWnMcEavU8r0orsEU1BMMSjAAUUxhHqwSt6AnI/annualGlare.png)
